Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to increase the penalties for patronizing child prostitutes.
Items.MatterName: Increase the penalties for patronizing child prostitutes.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass legislation requiring that all persons convicted of a felony or misdemeanor provide law enforcement with a DNA sample.
Items.MatterName: All persons convicted of a felony or misdemeanor provide law enforcement with a DNA sample.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to extend the statute of limitations for the prosecution of certain violent sex offenses.
Items.MatterName: State Legislature to extend the statute of limitations for the prosecution of certain violent sex offenses.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to amend the County Law so that the wireless telephone surcharge collected from residents of municipalities and counties that operate their own 911 emergency telecommunications system, such as New York City, be remitted to those municipalities and counties for payment of the costs related to operation of the emergency response system.

Resolution calling upon the Congress of the United States to distribute homeland security funding directly to the City of New York and other localities across the nation based upon risk assessment and target potential, to ensure maximum receipt of federal funds.
Items.MatterName: Fiscal 2003 Federal Budget appropriation of $3.5 billion
